name: Butt-Stomp Dragon
description:
[DESCRIPTION]

Made for Ludum Dare 33: You Are the Monster.

You are a clumsy dragon of the sky. For some reason, locals inhabitants of colorful floating islands are trying to ward you off. No matter, you're a friendly sort and in this game you visit the islands to explain yourself.
Unfortunately you can never quite land safely without destroying their homes.

[CONTROLS]
Mouse to aim at towers
LMB to begin flying toward them
*! W,A,S,D to dodge while flying !*

[CREDITS]
Andrew Bittman (@andrewbittman): Programming
